name: Line Roll~
description:
The objective of this game is simple : Drag your finger on the screen to move the ball either to the left or to the right and stay in the line !! But there is a twist in the tail : If you lift you finger during the game, you will lose.

Touch inside the yellow box that says, "Pan here to move..". Keep your finger on the screen and drag to the left or right to move. The ball will move with your finger as you drag it on the screen. Keep the ball inside the boundary line without lifting your finger or your game gets over!

Game Features :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Nice UI
* Cool animation
* No IAP, great user experience and much more..

Let's roll along the line while having fun....
